name: The Prototype: The Best Shooter Game
name_original: The Prototype: The Best Shooter Game
description:
This game is made when im on quarantine. The game itself are pretty much easy and fun at the same time your mission is to kill all covid that spawn randomly at the map. this game is still on development so if you have idea to update the game you can comment and i will reach to you! when the game reach a perfect state and i think its ready i will release it on steam for free...

80% money that i made from this game will donated to oppose Covid-19.
20% money will help me develop next game

All game assets are from itch.io itself so if you one of the assets owner you can contact me if you want me to delete the game thx.
